name: Little Adventurer III
description: This is a first-person casual game that focuses on going home after helping the little girl, and a few mini-games.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista/7,8, 10 or later Processor: 1.8 Ghz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 or Radeon HD 7690M XT DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
